about.title: Pony Club in Cadenet
about.description1: Welcome to Poney Club Desportis! Established in 2008, our equestrian center is located in Cadenet (84160), in the heart of 27 hectares of preserved nature in the Luberon Park (Vaucluse). We offer a wide range of equestrian activities for all levels, from age 3. Whether you are a beginner or an experienced rider, you can enjoy adapted lessons, training courses, trail rides, as well as boarding services for your horses and ponies.
about.description2: The welfare of our animals is at the heart of our concerns, as evidenced by our "Animal Welfare" certification. We are also proud of our "Poney de France" and "Quality" labels, which guarantee high-quality teaching in adapted and secure facilities.
about.description3: Throughout the year, we organize events such as training courses, competitions, and club celebrations. These moments are an opportunity to share our passion in a friendly atmosphere.
about.description4: Poney Club Desportis is much more than just an equestrian center. It's a space where respect, safety, and the pleasure of horse riding come together to offer an unforgettable experience, whether for a trail ride, a lesson, or boarding your horse.

leClub.title: About Poney Club Desportis
leClub.diplomasIntro: At Poney Club Desportis, we are proud of our achievements and the quality of our teaching. Here are our diplomas and certifications:

leClub.since: Partner of Poney Club Desportis since 2011
leClub.intro1: Since 2008, Poney Club Desportis has been committed to offering an exceptional equestrian experience in the heart of the Vaucluse countryside, combining passion, respect for animals, and expertise.
leClub.intro2: We offer a variety of services to meet the needs of all riders:
leClub.service1: Riding lessons for children and adults, adapted to all levels
leClub.service4: Guided trail rides on the property
leClub.facilities: Our facilities include a large sand arena of 60m x 30m, an 18m round pen, a cross-country course, a fixed shower, as well as numerous trail paths offering a natural and secure setting for your outings.
leClub.welfare: The welfare of our animals is our absolute priority. We provide them with the best care throughout their lives, including a peaceful retirement when they are no longer active. Our hay, produced near the club and of very high quality, guarantees healthy nutrition adapted to their needs.
leClub.conclusion: With years of experience and an ideal setting, Poney Club Desportis is the trusted choice for all horse riding enthusiasts, whether beginners or experienced riders.

2008.title: Foundation of Poney Club Desportis
2008.description: Beginning of our adventure with a passion for horse riding and pony welfare. Our club opened its doors with 4 small Shetland ponies (Coco, Elite, Malabar, Cookie) for children's lessons.

2009.title: Launch of lessons for teenagers
2009.description: Rentals and purchases of large ponies to introduce teenage riders to horse riding.

2010.title: Creation of boarding services
2010.description: Opening of our full boarding service, offering superior quality care to our boarders.

2014.title: Improvement of our facilities
2014.description: Renovation of our stables with the installation of a round pen, centralization of activities around the pony (tack room, paddocks, etc.)

2016.title: Extension of the trail system
2016.description: Expansion of internal forest trails. Installation of fences for safety and signage for riders.

2017.title: Creation of a cross-country course
2017.description: Inauguration of a course including a mound, drop, bank, tree trunks of different sizes and a hedge.

2020.title: Collaboration with a riding instructor
2020.description: Hiring of Clémence Médail for civic service followed by a pony instructor apprenticeship contract and assistance with her riding instructor training.

pensions.title: Full Boarding for Horses and Ponies
pensions.wellbeingText: At Poney Club Desportis, the welfare of your horses and ponies is our identity. We do everything possible to offer a serene and respectful living environment, where each equine can thrive in complete tranquility. Our approach is based on attentive care, balanced nutrition, and quality facilities, all supervised by a team of passionate professionals. The club is managed by the instructor
pensions.spacesText: Our boarders benefit from spacious paddocks in small groups or pairs, located on hillsides outside flood zones. These natural spaces allow them to move freely and satisfy their natural needs in a secure and well-maintained environment. In addition, facilities such as the arena, round pen, or cross-country course will allow you to thrive with your equine in nature.
pensions.foodText: Nutrition is an essential pillar of our equines' health, which is why we provide high-quality hay. Our experienced team ensures health monitoring and can direct you to all equine professionals. For the complete well-being of your companions, we also offer farrier and equine osteopathy services directly on site, guaranteeing responsive and adapted care.
